pkgmetadata.longdescription: Functional Tangential Angle Pseudo-Depth // Computes the functional tangential angle pseudo-depth and its robustified version from the paper by Kuhnt and Rehage (2016). See Kuhnt, S.; Rehage, A. (2016): An angle-based multivariate functional pseudo-depth for shape outlier detection, JMVA 146, 325-340, doi:10.1016/j.jmva.2015.10.016 for details.
